Text: Land Sale Cc Attached is a revised version of the Act of Sale and a redline of same compared to that which we sent to you earlier today Also attached is a revised Guaranty both clean and redlined and a form of Nonforeign Status The Act of Sale contains changes to the restriction language Draft resolutions to follow tomorrow GUARANTYDOC GUARANTY BLDOC Act of Sale Clean Draft ReliantDOC ACT OF SALE CLEAN DRAFT BL BASE DOC Certificate of Nonforeign Statusdoc GUARANTYDOC GUARANTY BLDOC Act of Sale Clean Draft ReliantDOC ACT OF SALE CLEAN DRAFT BL BASE DOC Certificate of Nonforeign Statusdoc
